Posts.Content: Hi I finished rads 13 days ago and my armpit is very sore now I have been using AQScream as per radiographers instructions but it is getting worse. Would I be better off using Aloe Vera gel? Marie
Posts.Title: Sore armpit after rads

Posts.Content: I don't ink it's broken will have to get hubby to look but I'm going to pop to boots this afternoon and get some aloe Vera gel just incase lol Marie
